doc:
Joseph Sweeney (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Sweeney_(actor) 0 Joseph Sweeney (July 26, 1884 – November 25, 1963) was an American actor who worked in stage productions, television and movies. His most famous role was as the elderly Juror #9 in the 1957 film 12 Angry Men, the role he originated in a 1954 Westinghouse Studio One live teleplay of which the film was an adaptation. Joseph_Sweeney ( July_26_,_1884 – November_25_,_1963 ) was an_American_actor who worked in stage_productions , television_and_movies . His_most_famous_role was as the_elderly_Juror_#_9 in the_1957_film_12_Angry_Men , the_role he originated in a_1954_Westinghouse_Studio_One_live_teleplay of which the_film was an_adaptation .
